title: What type of music can I use in YouTube videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any and all music. Though if it isn't royalty free, you have to provide credit such as the name of the song and the artist in either the video itself or the description.

Thanks for A2A. You can make many video's at your home by using your DSLR camera or smartphone camera. You can make video's like : Lecture video'sVinesFunny videosGadgets reviewsApp reviewsDaily trendsHow-to videos …. And many moreIf you have passion, no one can ruin your passion. You can also visit my YouTube channel, all videos on this channel are recorded with smartphone. YouTube channel : GADACTS Thanks.
YouTube’s music libraryRoyalty free music from 3rd party sites (be sure to verify rights)Licensed music for YouTube distribution
If you ever need royalty free music, just search “royalty free music” in youtube and a bunch of channels with constant updating playlists will arise.
